summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Villa Paris Gestionale. All core features verified: Menu Base CRUD with save feedback, Dashboard KPI loading, Calendario visualization, Eventi with filters, Clienti with export, Impostazioni persistence. 12/12 backend API tests passed. UI fully functional with proper styling.

minor.issue: Returns 400 without eventoId parameter - expected behavior, needs query param

passed_tests: Dashboard: All 4 KPI cards load correctly (Eventi mese, Ospiti previsti, Ricavi stimati, Clienti totali)
Dashboard: Prossimo Evento card displays correctly
Dashboard: Eventi Recenti list loads
Dashboard: Azioni Rapide buttons work
Menu Base: List view displays all menus (7 menus found)
Menu Base: Create new menu form opens correctly
Menu Base: Form validation shows error for empty name field
Menu Base: Save displays 'Salvataggio in corso...' status
Menu Base: Save success shows '✅ Menu salvato con successo!' message
Menu Base: Form auto-resets after successful save
Menu Base: New menu appears in list immediately after save
Menu Base: Copy, Edit, Delete buttons functional
Calendario: FullCalendar component renders with month view
Calendario: Navigation buttons (Oggi, Mese, Settimana) work
Calendario: Date picker 'Vai a:' allows navigation
Calendario: Legend shows event types with colors
Eventi: List displays 3 events with status badges
Eventi: Filter by Anno, Mese, Tipo, Stato working
Eventi: Search input present and functional
Clienti: 2 client cards display with contact info
Clienti: Export buttons (Stampa, Esporta Excel) present
Clienti: Search functionality works
Impostazioni: All sections load (Dati Azienda, Documenti PDF, Notifiche, Info Sistema)
Impostazioni: Data persists via localStorage
Impostazioni: Save shows success status
Sidebar: All 8 navigation links functional
Villa Paris branding and amber accent colors correct
Footer displays '© 2026 Villa Paris Gestionale v1.0.0'

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All pages load, navigate, and function correctly

seed_data_creation: Created test menus via Playwright: 'Test_Save_Feedback_6811', 'Test_Automated_6781'. These were automatically cleaned up by test teardown.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. App uses Next.js 15 with SQLite (Prisma). Menu Base save now has proper visual feedback with status messages. Settings saved to localStorage. 12 API tests in /app/test_reports/backend_test.py for regression testing.

menu_base_save_feedback.details: Save displays 'Salvataggio in corso...' then '✅ Menu salvato con successo!' then auto-resets form

menu_base_validation.details: Empty name shows '❌ Inserisci il nome del menu' error

sidebar_navigation.details: All 8 links navigate correctly: Dashboard, Calendario, Eventi, Clienti, Menu Base, Report, Stampe, Impostazioni

dashboard_kpi.details: All 4 KPI cards load from /api/eventi and /api/clienti

impostazioni_persistence.details: Settings saved to localStorage and restored on page load
